domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @MattHancock Dexamethasone new is great, but people are talking about it like this is going to end #COVID19 - read closely, it has no benefit until you need Oxygen, & 75% of people then use it & get no benefit. Of those on a ventilator, 66% still die. This is not a magic "end to lockdown"!
